title: Forum isn't registering me as my level
body:
Unless I am completely misunderstanding the forum situation in that it has it's own level system then oops, but I am currently Silver 4 (Check my profile icon for further proof) and I tried to go to post my submission to the dungeon masters set little competition. Now I have my little story on my copy & note pad {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
 and I am left absolutely clueless as to what to do. I have signed into the forum several times in the past and have never been able to post but now that it stops me from entering the contest I'm a little salty :C

replies.body: There's no different level system, but a syncing situation when posting for the first time.  It looks like your post has sync your account with the boards since you are posting for the first time.  Everything looks okay now!
Thank you my friend. Now I can post my fan fictions about {{champion:6}} and {{champion:103}}
